protected void initFormNavigatorEntry(
      String servletContextName,
      Properties portalProperties,
      String portalPropertiesKey,
      String categoryKey,
      String formNavigatorId,
      String jspPath) {

    String[] formNavigatorSections =
        StringUtil.split(portalProperties.getProperty(portalPropertiesKey));

    for (int i = 0; i < formNavigatorSections.length; i++) {
      String formNavigatorSection = formNavigatorSections[i];

      FormNavigatorEntry<Object> deprecatedFormNavigatorEntry =
          new DeprecatedFormNavigatorEntry(
              formNavigatorSection,
              formNavigatorSection,
              categoryKey,
              formNavigatorId,
              "/html/portlet/" + jspPath + "/" + formNavigatorSection + ".jsp");

      registerService(
          servletContextName,
          formNavigatorId + categoryKey + formNavigatorSection,
          FormNavigatorEntry.class,
          deprecatedFormNavigatorEntry,
          "service.ranking",
          -i);
    }
  }
